definition: suggestive of fireworks, (usually plural) a device with an explosive that burns at a low rate and with colored flames
details:
adjective
- suggestive of fireworks
= example: suggestive of fireworks
- of or relating to the craft of making fireworks
= example: of or relating to the craft of making fireworks
= synonyms: pyrotechnical
noun
- (usually plural) a device with an explosive that burns at a low rate and with colored flames
= synonyms: firework
